items.title: Inside the Bears' wild comeback win over the Packers in OT
items.description: Caleb Williams, Cairo Santos, DJ Moore and Jahdae Walker were key parts of a wild night in Chicago.

items.title: Vikings QB McCarthy ruled out with hand injury
items.description: Vikings quarterback J.J. McCarthy suffered a hand injury in Sunday's game against the Giants.

items.title: Browns standout rookie RB Judkins carted off
items.description: Browns rookie running back Quinshon Judkins left Sunday's game against the Buffalo Bills on a cart after suffering a right leg injury.
